Kubernetes down means Home Assistant, its DB, etc down.

Of course its data is in Ceph & the ceph keys are in Kubernetes secrets, which are in etcd, all of which are unavailable.

So restoring etcd from snapshots, parsing layers of k8s protos to find my secrets.

Happy Sunday! 🙄 https://t.co/hkRnDbfxta pic.twitter.com/4lckG6MBBP

— Brad Fitzpatrick (@bradfitz) September 13, 2020
